Title: CmdLines Eggamples 101 !
ToolTip: Here some examples on cmd lines possibilities

Title: BATCH
ToolTip: This is a regular windows batch

Title: PS5
Command:
Write-Host "Powershel 5 , in the house"
Get-ChildItem
Read-Host

Title: PSCORE
ToolTip: This is a Powershell Core script

Title: NODE
MORE
ToolTip: This is just a placeholder for a submenu

Title: SubMenu1
ToolTip: This is how to create another submenu under MORE
Command:
This is how to create another submenu under MORE  , value= K1\MORE\SubMenu1
pause

Title: SubMenu2
ToolTip: This is how to create another submenu under MORE

Title: SubMenu2.1
ToolTip: This is how to create another submenu under MORE
Command:
This is how to create another submenu under MORE  , value= K1\MORE\SubMenu2\SubMenu2.1
pause
